Description

TREBUCHET is a studio founded in Montreal in 2017 with a focus on crafting innovative VR games. Our first game, Prison Boss VR, is an award-winning game available on all VR platforms. Started straight out of university, the studio rapidly became a full-fledged company working on multiple projects, but the mission stays the same: making fun games with a cool team.

History

TREBUCHET was founded by Vincent Brunet-Dupont, Guillaume Duquesne and Alexandre Pernot Lopes, then students at the University of Montréal. Their first project, Prison Boss VR, released on Steam in August 2017. Prison Boss VR was then released on PlayStation VR in December 2018 and on Oculus Quest in December 2020. The game won the 2018 Microsoft DREAM.BUILD.PLAY award as Best Mixed Reality Game. The studio has also released the multiplayer location-based game Jousting Time in different locations throughout the world. Their latest game, Winds & Leaves, a PS VR exclusive, is to be released in the Spring of 2021.
